attributes.action: ask the Executive Board of the Football Association to put in place a caretaker board and to resign their positions at the earliest opportunity.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Following the recent team results and in light of public and fans opinion it is clear that the Board of the FA has lost the confidence of the public and the game in general. The caretaker board should conduct a full and frank enquiry into the running of the FA and the recent results of the team. It should then appoint a new board following the outcome of its enquiries.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
